articles.content: Now is a good moment to buy the MacBook Air M1 as a grad gift or as a travel companion for yourself. Amazon is once again selling the base MacBook Air for $850 after a $100 discount at checkout. You'… [+977 chars]

articles.title: Amazon's Fire TV sale cuts its streaming devices by up to 42 percent - Engadget
